summary: Frontend-only testing of add-ons checkout flow for Classes and Retreats pages. All requested features verified working correctly.

issues: Login sometimes requires multiple attempts due to session handling - not a blocker but worth monitoring

critical_code_review_comments: ClassesPage.js: Add-ons checkout flow implemented correctly with toggleAddOn, calculateTotal functions
RetreatsPage.js: Add-ons integrated into payment options with dynamic price updates
ImageCropUploader.js: Reusable component for image cropping with ProfileImageUploader variant
ClassManagement.js: Add-ons displayed in table with badge showing count
RetreatManagement.js: Add-ons management in forms working
seed_data_creation: Existing test data used: Morning Yoga Flow class with 2 add-ons, Mountain Serenity Retreat with 3 add-ons
context_for_next_testing_agent: Add-ons checkout flow fully implemented and tested. Classes page shows add-ons in enrollment dialog with checkboxes and dynamic price updates. Retreats page shows add-ons in booking dialog with payment option prices updating. Admin panel shows add-ons count badges in tables. Shop page shows stock count and out-of-stock handling. Dashboard has profile picture upload with camera button.

classes_page_addons.details: Enrollment dialog shows 'Optional Add-ons' section with checkboxes. Selecting add-ons updates prices dynamically. 'Morning Yoga Flow' has 2 add-ons: Yoga Mat ($35), Props Kit ($25). Selected add-ons summary shows total.

retreats_page_addons.details: Booking dialog shows 'Optional Add-ons' section with 3 add-ons: Private Massage ($95), Sound Bath ($45), Airport Shuttle ($60). Payment option prices update dynamically showing base + add-ons breakdown.

admin_classes_addons.details: Classes table shows '+2 add-ons' badge for Morning Yoga Flow. Add-ons management available in class forms.

admin_retreats_addons.details: Mountain Serenity Retreat displayed in admin. Add-ons management available in retreat forms.

admin_image_cropper.details: Add Product form shows 'Upload Image' button with 'Click to upload and crop your image' text. ImageCropUploader component integrated.

shop_stock_display.details: Products show 'Out of Stock' badges prominently. Out of stock products have disabled 'Out of Stock' button instead of 'Add to Cart'. Size/Flavor dropdowns with prices displayed.

dashboard_profile_picture.details: Dashboard has profile picture area with camera button to open ProfileImageUploader dialog. Uses circular crop for profile pictures.

imageupload_deleted.details: ImageUpload.js component successfully deleted - file not found in frontend directory.

api_data_verification.classes_api: Morning Yoga Flow has addOns array with 2 items (Yoga Mat $35, Props Kit $25)
api_data_verification.retreats_api: Mountain Serenity Retreat has addOns array with 3 items (Private Massage $95, Sound Bath $45, Airport Shuttle $60)
